author: olegk
msg: HTTPCLIENT-640: HostConfiguration that gets its Host from a factory.

This is useful for integrating a specialized Protocol or SocketFactory; for example, a SecureSocketFactory that authenticates via SSL. Use HttpClient.setHostConfiguration to install a HostConfigurationWithHostFactory that contains the specialized HostFactory, Protocol or SocketFactory
Contributed by John Kristian <jkristian at netflix.com>
